sentences.sContent: Inertia carried the plane onto the ground.
I can't seem to throw off this feeling of inertia.
sentences.sCn: 我好像无法摆脱这种无力的感觉。

sentences.sContent: ...moving objects have two characteristics relevant to understanding the dynamics of energy systems: inertia and momentum...
...understanding energy system inertia and momentum can help you decide whether their plans are feasible...

synos.tran: [力]惯性；[化学]惰性，迟钝；不活动

phrases.pCn: 热惰性；热惯性（温升速率的倒数）；热惯量
转动惯量；转动惯性；惯性矩
惯性力矩，惯性矩；惰性力矩

remMethod.val: in(不) ＋ ert(动) ＋ ia → 不活动 → 无力

trans.tranOther: the force that keeps an object in the same position or keeps it moving until it is moved or stopped by another force
